org.restsql.tools

Interface ResourceDefinitionGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResourceDefinitionGenerator, MySqlResourceDefinitionGenerator, PostgreSqlResourceDefinitionGenerator

    public interface ResourceDefinitionGenerator
    Creates resource definition files, one per table found in the specified database, to the specified subdirectory.
    Author:
    Mark Sawers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ResourceDefinitionGenerator.GenerationException
      Represents generation exception.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int generate(String relativeSubDir, String databaseName, String exclusionPattern)
      Creates resource definition files, one per table in the provided database.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        int generate(String relativeSubDir,
           String databaseName,
           String exclusionPattern)
             throws ResourceDefinitionGenerator.GenerationException
        Creates resource definition files, one per table in the provided database.
        Parameters:
        relativeSubDir - directory path relative to sql resources directory to create
        databaseName - database name
        exclusionPattern - table name pattern to exclude
        Returns:
        number of definitions created
        Throws:
        ResourceDefinitionGenerator.GenerationException - if a database access or file write error occurs
